name: Jocko - The Game
description:
A motivator game made in the style of 'Jocko podcast'. Tap the text to advance.

The purpose of the game is to show how a motivator can be made using Construct 2. It's very limited with about 7 Jocko questions and 3 Echo's. If you have dialog you want added to the game, just comment below.

Devlog: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTiEHOCelIoifkuMWITysa-IeS_Y4Gysc

Jocko podcast: http://jockopodcast.com/
